description: [``botocore``] This release adds support for a new boot mode for EC2 instances called 'UEFI Preferred'.
[``botocore``] The AWS Elemental MediaConvert SDK has improved handling for different input and output color space combinations.
[``botocore``] AWS Elemental MediaLive adds support for Nielsen watermark timezones.
[``botocore``] Amazon Transcribe now supports role access for these API operations: CreateVocabulary, UpdateVocabulary, CreateVocabularyFilter, and UpdateVocabularyFilter.
